pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulations for Electrochemistry Experiments // Simulates cyclic voltammetry, linear-sweep voltammetry (both with and without stirring of the solution), and single-pulse and double-pulse chronoamperometry and chronocoulometry experiments using the implicit finite difference method outlined in Gosser (1993, ISBN: 9781560810261) and in Brown (2015) doi:10.1021/acs.jchemed.5b00225. Additional functions provide ways to display and to examine the results of these simulations. The primary purpose of this package is to provide tools for use in courses in analytical chemistry.
